So, this challenge basically is to "complete" career mode with only SSTONLs. "Complete" means that you just need to get through career mode and have as much money by the end of the tech tree as possible. Both stock and mod allowed and so is any version, so use this to your advantage! (No OP or cheaty SSTO parts (Rapiers and similars are allowed))

Leaderboards

1.

2.

3.

I don't think this is possible in career mode... where's your entry?

I'd suggest looking at the challenge submission guidelines.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide)
Good luck making an SSTO with the tier 0 parts. I think you need to rethink the rules a bit.
